backgroundInformationList.description: Declaration of Surplus Property - Located to the south of 25 Earnscliffe Road

noticeDescription:
NOTICE is hereby given that in accordance with the City of Toronto’s real estate disposal By-law, on August 27, 2024 the parcel of land, located to the south of 25 Earnscliffe Road is legally described as all of PIN 10473-0461 (LT), LT 11 PL 2479 TWP Of York; Toronto (YORK), City of Toronto was declared surplus.

 

The property has an area of approximately 58 m2 (625 ft2).  The City proposes that the intended manner of disposal is to be by way of an offer to purchase from the abutting owner.

 

The following City official has information about the proposed disposition: Mr. Sami Aljundi, Property Officer, Real Estate Services, Tel: 416-338-4862, Metro Hall, 55 John Street, 2nd floor, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3C6. Enquiries may be made of the said official until September 13, 2024.
title: Declaration of Surplus Property - Located to the south of 25 Earnscliffe Road
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
